lines.content: LUNA is a **desktop app made for students to organise their daily tasks**, optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI) while still having the benefits of a Graphical User Interface (GUI).
- Mark and Unmark tasks as done
Deletes a task at the given `INDEX`.\
Marks a task at the given `INDEX` as done.\
Unmarks a previously marked task at given `INDEX` as undone.\
Assigns a priority (`high`, `medium`, `low`) to task at given `INDEX`.\
Displays the current tasks in the list
Saves the current list and exits the app

LUNA is a **desktop app made for students to organise their daily tasks**, optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI) while still having the benefits of a Graphical User Interface (GUI).
- Mark and Unmark tasks as done
Deletes a task at the given `INDEX`.\
Marks a task at the given `INDEX` as done.\
Unmarks a previously marked task at given `INDEX` as undone.\
Assigns a priority (`high`, `medium`, `low`) to task at given `INDEX`.\
Displays the current tasks in the list
Saves the current list and exits the app

* Returns a String object representing this DukeException's value.
* @return the string representation of the specified DukeException
return ("LUNA is questioning the format of your input... " + errorMessage);

<Label fx:id="dialog" minHeight="-Infinity" style="-fx-background-color: #1e81b0#1e81b0; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-label-padding: 8; -fx-background-radius: 20;" text="Label" wrapText="true">

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/18" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="duke.MainWindow">
<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="324.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" />

<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="324.0" layoutY="558.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="76.0" style="-fx-background-color: #063970#063970;" text="Send" textFill="WHITE">
